name: Orrbi
description:
ARROW KEYS TO MOVE

RIGHT:  Down-Right

DOWN: Down-Left

UP: Up-Right

LEFT: Up-Left

Collect fish, lead enemies into rolling barrels, and run away to avoid your enemies!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
